title: CCV ranks first in Vermont as a Best for Vets College
description: MONTPELIER — The Community College of Vermont (CCV) has been recognized as a Military Times Best for Vets 2025 College. This national ranking is considered the largest and most comprehensive evaluation of how well colleges and universities support military service...

title: Ashville Council adds new member and discusses data center(s)
description: ASHVILLE - On Monday evening, the Village of Ashville held the second of their regularly scheduled bimonthly meeting. It was the first meeting with Roger Clark serving as Mayor, due to the resignation of former Mayor Steve Welsh.

title: LifeBridge Health names Jennifer Nickoles first woman CEO, president
description: CEO Neil Meltzer will retire after 13 years as LifeBridge's president and CEO in June 2026, according to the organization's press release. Meltzer and Nickoles will share the roles until then.

title: First Nation sues B.C. government over alleged secret land policy
description: A First Nation is suing the B.C. government alleging it advanced a secret land claim policy to give away rights to its traditional territory, surrender control over lucrative carbon credits, and prevent it from safeguarding threatened caribou.

title: West Virginia State Parks to Host 24 'First Day Hikes' to Kick Off 2026
description: CHARLESTON, W.Va. — West Virginia State Parks officials announced Wednesday that 21 state parks and forests will host 24 "First Day Hikes" on Jan. 1, continuing a popular tradition to ring in the New Year.

title: First Nation sues B.C. government over alleged secret land policy

title: LifeBridge Health names Jennifer Nickoles first woman CEO, president
description: CEO Neil Meltzer will retire after 13 years as LifeBridge's president and CEO in June 2026, according to the organization's press release. Meltzer and Nickoles will share the roles until then.

title: Ten sentenced to imprisonment in attempt-to-murder case
description: Ten BJP workers sentenced to jail and fined for the 2007 attempted murder of CPI(M) activist Champadan Rajesh in Kannur.

title: Here's How 'Survivor' Finale Will Handle Trump's Speech Interruption: Will the Entire Episode Air?
description: The Survivor season 49 finale is set to air tonight, but there’s going to be an interruption to the episode. Donald Trump announced he will be making a speech tonight (December 17) at 9pm ET. The Survivor finale starts at 8pm ET, and is three hours long. CBS released a statement, explaining how it will [...]

title: Hogwarts Legacy Hits 40 Million Copies Sold Milestone
description: Even years after its release, Hogwarts Legacy continues to appeal global players. That’s because Warner Bros has shared a massive milestone, confirming the game has now sold over 40 million copies on consoles and PC. There has been an addition of six million copies sold since March 2025. Just to be clear these figures reflect [...]
